--- khamkain <kham31@...> wrote:

> Chop quickly salute Jotunn : Allright sir! 
> 
> He looked at Brody the he turned to the opening door. Enough was said
> for these two brothers in arms. They both jumped out of the shuttle
> only to combine and transformed into a compact but heavily equiped
> transport chopper. Rapdly they rise up in the sky to be cover by the
> cloud scanning for pursuier while keeping a safe distance from the
> shutte.

Nightrazor watched as the chopper exited the shuttle and for a moment
he almost thought he had been discovered. But when he saw the Chopper
assume a watching posture he relaxed and continued to mirror the
movements of the shuttle maintained his shielding. The time was not yet
ripe for attack, but when the time came . . .  

He did a mental inventory of his weapns and smiled inwardly as he
continued to fly.


OOC: Yes, I was thinking of Star Trek as well when writing my last
pose. His cloak is much like the Romulan one, and shares a similar
weakness: He cannot attack while cloaked!  

*RATS!*   

>:)

Preston
(Nightrazor)
